thread.title: Eight Days of Hope deploys to Texas to aid flash flood victims | Local News | djournal.com
thread.title_full: Eight Days of Hope deploys to Texas to aid flash flood victims | Local News | djournal.com

author: Special to the Daily Journal
title: Eight Days of Hope deploys to Texas to aid flash flood victims | Local News | djournal.com
text:
TUPELO — Members of Tupelo-based nonprofit Eight Days of Hope's Rapid Response Ministry are deploying to Kerrville, Texas, in response to the deadly flash flooding that occurred on July 4.
As of July 10, there have been at least 120 deaths reported and over 170 people still missing as a result of the rapidly rising Guadelupe River.
